bibl.title: Letter from H.V. Stirling to Mabel H. Lazear, July 29, 1937

div1.p: Stirling informs Mabel Lazear that her pension identification number has been changed.

div1.head: Letter from H.V. Stirling to Mabel H. Lazear, July 29, 1937
div1.opener:
VETERANS ADMINISTRATION
VETERANS ADMINISTRATION
WASHINGTON
July 29, 1937.
YOUR FILE REFERENCE:
IN REPLY REFER TO: DAB-C
Mrs. Mabel H. Lazear,
116 East Padre Street,
Santa Barbara, California.
LAZEAR, Jesse W.
XC-2,668,368
Yellow Fever Annuity
Dear Madam:
div1.p:
Reference is made to your account as a yellow fever annuitant
on which you are paid at the rate of $125.00 monthly.

For identification purposes, claim numbers are assigned to
each account of the Administration; therefore, XC-2,668,368 has been
assigned to your file and hereafter this number will appear on your
monthly checks. All inquiries relative to your account should bear the
above number.
div1.closer:
Respectfully, H. V. STIRLING,
Director of Finance.
